Package com.intellij.execution.configurations

Interface SearchScopeProvidingRunProfile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RunProfile
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModuleRunConfiguration, ModuleRunProfile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPythonLegacyTestRunConfiguration, AbstractPythonRunConfiguration, AbstractPythonTestRunConfiguration, AbstractRunConfiguration, AbstractServerPythonRunConfiguration, ApplicationConfiguration, DocutilsRunConfiguration, ExternalSystemRunConfiguration, GradleRunConfiguration, GroovyScriptRunConfiguration, JarApplicationConfiguration, JavadocGeneratorRunProfile, JavaScratchConfiguration, JavaTestConfigurationBase, JavaTestConfigurationWithDiscoverySupport, JUnitConfiguration, ModuleBasedConfiguration, MvcRunConfiguration, PyTestRunConfiguration, PythonDocTestRunConfiguration, PythonNoseTestRunConfiguration, PythonRunConfiguration, PythonUnitTestRunConfiguration, PyToxConfiguration, RemoteConfiguration, RestRunConfiguration, RuntimeConfiguration, RuntimeConfigurationProducer.DelegatingRuntimeConfiguration, SphinxRunConfiguration, ToolRunProfile, XsltRunConfiguration

    public interface SearchScopeProvidingRunProfile
extends RunProfile
    Base interface for run configurations that can specify which part of the project should be used to search sources. This information will be used to provide more accurate navigation to sources from stack traces, debugger, etc
